BAIR.description: [Speech Group] Working on full-duplex conversational behavior reasoning through predictive Transformer models and causal inference within a Graph of Thought; we recently submitted to ICLR 2026 and are pending review.

CNMAT.description: Deep learning for differentiable, iterative sound hybridization. My work focuses on neural methods for optimizing a superposition of audio signals in an overdetermined system.

Amazon.description: Designed and deployed Cerberus, a scalable agentic AI model that aggregates and analyzes business metrics for global-scale AdTech systems. Serves 80+ program-region combinations and is scaled to operate 24/7.

Tona.description: Full-stack developer for a startup integrating AI into the music production process. Cool work involving designing frontend UI/UX (React, Next.JS), developing backend ML models (PyTorch, LarsNet, Docker), and managing databases (AWS s3, Supabase).

UCSB.description: Cognitive-science informed mappings from music to sculpture in pursuit of meaningful synaesthetic artwork (1) & exploring deep reinforcement learning as an experience in extended reality i.e. live ML training in AR/VR (2).
